description: Home visits will be banned, bars will be closed and dining at restaurants will be prohibited. Schools and salons, however, will remain open.
content:
After a surge in coronavirus cases, Montreal will enter a partial shutdown for almost a month, officials said Monday.

title: Tampa airport to offer Covid testing to passengers
description: Tampa International Airport is the first in the nation to offer Covid testing to passengers. The tests are a passenger expense, and those who test positive are advised not to fly.
